hasMessage.hasTextContent: Mitoxantrone   is predicted to   increase   the risk of cardiotoxicity when given with   trastuzumab emtansine .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both mitoxantrone and treosulfan can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  mitoxantrone  and  treosulfan  can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasDitaContent.@value: Typhoid vaccine, oral is predicted to increase the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with mitoxantrone. Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Typhoid vaccine, oral   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   mitoxantrone .  Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Varicella-zoster vaccine   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   mitoxantrone .  Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .
